name: announcement
title: Announcement
description: A compound badge designed to display an announcement.

name: avatar-stack
title: Avatar Stack
description: Avatar Stack is a component that allows you to stack and overlap avatars.

name: banner
title: Banner
description: A banner is a full-width component that can be used to show a message and action to the user.

name: choicebox
title: Choicebox
description: Choiceboxes are a great way to show radio or checkbox options with a card style.

name: code-block
title: Code Block
description: Provides syntax highlighting, line numbers, and copy to clipboard functionality for code blocks.

name: color-picker
title: Color Picker
description: Allows users to select a color. Modeled after the color picker in Figma.

name: contribution-graph
title: Contribution Graph
description: A GitHub-style contribution graph component that displays activity levels over time.

name: cursor
title: Cursor
description: A cursor component, great for realtime interactive applications.

name: image-zoom
title: Image Zoom
description: Image zoom is a component that allows you to zoom in on an image.

name: kanban
title: Kanban
description: A kanban board is a visual tool that helps you manage and visualize your work. It is a board with columns, and each column represents a status, e.g. "Backlog", "In Progress", "Done".

name: marquee
title: Marquee
description: Marquees are a great way to show a list of items in a horizontal scrolling motion.

name: pill
title: Pill
description: A flexible badge component designed for a variety of use cases.

name: qr-code
title: QR Code
description: QR Code is a component that generates a QR code from a string.

name: snippet
title: Snippet
description: Snippet is a component that allows you to display and copy code in a tabbed interface.

name: spinner
title: Spinner
description: The Spinner component expands the shadcn spinner component with additional variants.

name: status
title: Status
description: Status components are used to display the uptime of a service.

name: stories
title: Stories
description: A carousel of friends' stories, in video, image or avatar format.

name: theme-switcher
title: Theme Switcher
description: A component to switch between light, dark and system theme.

name: typography
title: typography
description: A component for applying consistent typography styles across your application.
